channel.description: Recent content in Readings on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Readings
item.description: The textbook is Guttag, John. Introduction to Computation and Programming Using Python: With Application to Understanding Data. 2nd ed. MIT Press, 2016. ISBN: 9780262529624. [Preview with Google Books] It is available both in hard copy and as an e-book. SESÂ # TOPICS READINGS 1 Introduction and Optimization Problems Chapter 12.1, Chapter 5.4 2 Optimization Problems Chapter 13 3 Graph-theoretic Models Chapter 12.2 4 Stochastic Thinking Chapter 14 5 Random Walks Chapter 11, Chapter 14 6 Monte Carlo Simulation Chapter 15.
